Categories

Attachments are files that users have uploaded to the forum while posting or editing a new thread or reply. MyBB provides an easy interface to upload and manage these attachments.

  • Posting attachments
  • Managing attachments with the User CP
  • Managing attachments in the Admin CP
MyBB Features
Archive Mode - Attachments - Multiquote - MyCode - Polls - Private Messages - Reputation - RSS Syndication - Search Engine Friendly URLs - Smilies - Subscriptions - User Groups - User Referrals - Warning System
This is obviously not the complete feature list. See Features.
